title: Kevin Hart's Irresponsible Tour, President Trump's State of the Union Address and Philadelphia Eagles
itunes:title: Kevin Hart's Irresponsible Tour, President Trump's State of the Union Address and Philadelphia Eagles
description:
Funny man Kevin Hart joins The Steve Harvey Morning Show to discuss his "Irresponsible Tour," President Trump's State of the Union Address, Kevin's love for the Philadelphia Eagles and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
